text: @RLong_Bailey @GavinWilliamson My Dad died of Coronavirus last weekend. It’s clearly a joke to you. I don’t want the government kept busy with anything other than getting on with the excellent job they are doing and trying to save more lives. Hope you are utterly ashamed
